chapter.title: Multi-Site Clusters (Geo Clusters)
chapter.remark: taroth 2011-10-06: DEVs, how is storage access solved in multi-site clusters? anything the cluster admin needs to check or configure? (with regards to storage?)

abstract.para: Apart from local clusters and metro area clusters, &productnamereg; &productnumber; also supports multi-site clusters (geo clusters). That means you can have multiple, geographically dispersed sites with a local cluster each. Failover between these clusters is coordinated by a higher level entity, the so-called booth. Support for multi-site clusters is available as a separate option to &productname;. For details on how to use and set up multi-site clusters, refer to the &geoquick;.
